title: 3 and Out - Cowboys Woodshed WFT, Josh Allen, Pats Revenge Game, Chiefs ROLLIN, Colts Mo
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Cowboys Woodshed WFT, Josh Allen, Pats Revenge Game, Chiefs ROLLIN, Colts Mo
description:
John breaks down the Cowboys taking the WFT behind the woodshed, Josh Allen's revenge game against Belichick, the suddenly red hot Chiefs, and the surging Colts.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
